## ProgramBuilder.select() method

Same as the select builtin function in WGSL, only valid for WebGPU device

**Signature:**

```typescript
select(x: number | PBShaderExp, y: number | PBShaderExp, cond: boolean | PBShaderExp): PBShaderExp;
```
